venue.name: The foot bridge going over Storrow drive

item.description:
This is a free Festival at the Boston Memorial Hatch Shell! the festival is from 11:00 am until 5:00 p.m.! I think this is a great opportunity for us to get out there and open some people's eyes! Via flyers posters or whatever we have, people need to know what's going on!!!
-Dan
http://www.myradio929...
FULL LINEUP TO BE ANNOUNCED EARTH DAY - APRIL 22ND!

We're thrilled to announce the 17th Annual Radio 92.9 EarthFest will be held on May 22nd, 2010 from Noon to 5:00 pm at the DCR's Hatch Memorial Shell in Boston. The free festival will feature performances from National and Local acts to be announced soon!

Presented by Whole Foods Market and free to the public, Radio 92.9 EarthFest will once again be a celebration for the Earth showcasing environmentally friendly products, groups, and activities. Radio 92.9 EarthFest will also feature an all-star musical line-up, an interactive family area and more. Produced in conjunction with the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation, the event is expected to draw more than 125,000!
item.how_to_find_us: Email the organizers personally that rsvp for the event or look for updates as the date approaches for meeting locations and times.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 5/22 Free Radio 92.9 EarthFest Concerts at the Hatch Shell
